title: Drawing, "Designs for Souvenir Fans for the 1867 Paris Exposition Universelle", 1866–67
medium: Transparent and opaque watercolor, white gouache, graphite on grey-green tracing paper
inscribed:
Upper left, graphite: No 4
Upper right, graphite: 245
description: Northern Italian lake scene drawn in graphite, oval shape; framed with strawberries, small white flowers, green leaves; a blue ribbon strung below scene inscribed in pen and black ink, à Paris Exposition Universel de 1867

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Designs for Souvenir Fans for the 1867 Paris Exposition Universelle", 1866–67.Transparent and opaque watercolor, white gouache, graphite on grey-green tracing paper. Gift of M. Roy Fisher. 1976-105-4.
